result.purpose: A simple web page template designed to demonstrate basic HTML structure and CSS styling for educational purposes. It serves as a starting point for users to learn about web development and GitHub repository management.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple web architecture pattern with a separation of concerns between content (HTML), styling (CSS), and documentation (Markdown).

root.purpose: This folder contains the basic structure and styling for a web page.
root.architecture: The folder follows a simple web architecture pattern with a separation of concerns between content (HTML), styling (CSS), and documentation (Markdown).

README.md.purpose: This file provides an example and instructions for forking a repository on GitHub.

index.html.purpose: This file defines the structure and content of a web page.

styles.css.purpose: Defines styles for HTML elements including margins, padding, and font properties.
